short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Get definitions of highlighted words using DictionaryAPI.dev.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Searching for quick definitions while browsing? The "On-Page Meaning Lookup Extension" for Chrome is your go-to solution. Simply select a single word on any webpage and click on our extension icon to instantly get its meaning. Whether you’re diving into new content or just curious about a term, this extension ensures you don’t have to leave your page or open a new tab.
Key Features:
On-Screen Definition: Instantly fetch definitions right on your current tab.
Simple to Use: Just select a word and click our extension. No hassles.
Free to Use: Get comprehensive word lookup without any cost.
